name: Chicken Pot Pie
author: Brenda Schlosser Morrison

ingredients.name: c. cubed cooked chicken or turkey
(10 oz.) can refrigerator Hungry Jack flaky biscuits

instructions:
Can use broccoli, cauliflower, carrots and potatoes.
In 3 quart oblong baking dish, combine soup, milk, thyme and pepper. Stir in vegetables and chicken. Bake at 400Â° for 15 minutes or until mixture begins to bubble. Meanwhile, cut each biscuit into quarters. Remove dish from oven; stir. Arrange biscuit pieces over hot chicken mixture. Bake 15 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown.
